title: Technology & Media
description: Learn vocabulary for talking about technology, social media, and digital life.

words.meaning: a piece of electronic equipment
words.example: I use several devices for work, including a laptop and tablet.
words.exampleTranslation: 저는 노트북과 태블릿을 포함해 여러 기기를 업무에 사용해요.

words.meaning: to copy data from the internet to a computer
words.example: You can download the app for free.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 앱을 무료로 다운로드할 수 있어요.

words.meaning: to send data from a computer to the internet
words.example: I uploaded the photos to social media.
words.exampleTranslation: SNS에 사진을 업로드했어요.

words.meaning: a link between devices or to the internet
words.example: The WiFi connection is very slow today.
words.exampleTranslation: 오늘 와이파이 연결이 아주 느려요.

words.meaning: to add the newest information or features
words.example: Don't forget to update your software regularly.
words.exampleTranslation: 정기적으로 소프트웨어를 업데이트하는 것을 잊지 마세요.

words.meaning: a secret word to access an account
words.example: You should change your password regularly.
words.exampleTranslation: 비밀번호를 정기적으로 바꿔야 해요.

words.meaning: the right to keep personal information secret
words.example: Social media raises concerns about privacy.
words.exampleTranslation: 소셜 미디어는 프라이버시에 대한 우려를 불러일으켜요.

words.meaning: the flat surface where images appear
words.example: I spend too much time staring at a screen.
words.exampleTranslation: 화면을 너무 오래 쳐다봐요.

words.meaning: an alert or message from an app
words.example: I turned off notifications to focus better.
words.exampleTranslation: 집중하려고 알림을 껐어요.

words.meaning: to look for information online
words.example: Just search for it on the internet.
words.exampleTranslation: 인터넷에서 검색해 보세요.

words.meaning: to post content for others to see
words.example: She shares interesting articles on her feed.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 피드에 흥미로운 기사를 공유해요.

words.meaning: to subscribe to someone's social media account
words.example: I follow several news accounts on Twitter.
words.exampleTranslation: 트위터에서 여러 뉴스 계정을 팔로우해요.

words.meaning: information or material on a website
words.example: The platform has great educational content.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 플랫폼에는 훌륭한 교육 콘텐츠가 있어요.

words.meaning: to watch/listen to content online without downloading
words.example: I usually stream movies instead of downloading them.
words.exampleTranslation: 저는 보통 영화를 다운로드하지 않고 스트리밍해요.

words.meaning: spreading quickly and widely online
words.example: The video went viral overnight.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 동영상이 하룻밤 사이에 입소문이 났어요.

words.meaning: able to be trusted
words.example: Is this website a reliable source of information?
words.exampleTranslation: 이 웹사이트는 신뢰할 수 있는 정보원인가요?

words.meaning: false information presented as real news
words.example: It's important to identify fake news online.
words.exampleTranslation: 온라인에서 가짜 뉴스를 식별하는 것이 중요해요.

words.meaning: the power to affect others' opinions or actions
words.example: Social media can influence public opinion.
words.exampleTranslation: 소셜 미디어는 여론에 영향을 줄 수 있어요.

words.meaning: the state of being unable to stop using something
words.example: Phone addiction is a growing problem.
words.exampleTranslation: 스마트폰 중독은 점점 커지는 문제예요.

words.meaning: relating to electronic technology
words.example: We live in a digital age.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리는 디지털 시대에 살아요.

words.meaning: to look at websites without a specific purpose
words.example: I spent an hour just browsing online stores.
words.exampleTranslation: 온라인 쇼핑몰을 한 시간 동안 그냥 둘러봤어요.

words.meaning: to sign up to receive content regularly
words.example: I subscribe to several YouTube channels.
words.exampleTranslation: 여러 유튜브 채널을 구독해요.

words.meaning: a website or app that provides a service
words.example: Instagram is a popular social media platform.
words.exampleTranslation: 인스타그램은 인기 있는 소셜 미디어 플랫폼이에요.

words.meaning: a set of rules a computer follows to solve problems
words.example: Social media algorithms decide what you see.
words.exampleTranslation: 소셜 미디어 알고리즘이 무엇을 볼지 결정해요.

words.meaning: protection against online threats
words.example: Cybersecurity is more important than ever.
words.exampleTranslation: 사이버 보안은 그 어느 때보다 중요해요.

exercises.question: I need to _____ the latest version of the app.
You should create a strong _____ to protect your account.
The video went _____ and got millions of views.
I turned off my phone _____ because they were distracting me.
Is this website a _____ source of information?
Social media _____ like Instagram and TikTok are very popular.
_____ news can spread quickly on social media.
I _____ to several news channels on YouTube.
Phone _____ is becoming a serious problem for many people.
